exercise_text: What is the correct way to greet someone in the morning?
Fill in the blank: Nice to ___ you!
Which expressions are used to say goodbye? (Choose all that apply)
What number comes after nine?
Fill in the blank: There are ___ days in a week.
Which day comes after Monday?
Fill in the blank: Yesterday ___ Sunday.
She ___ to school every day. (go)
Choose the correct sentence:
Fill in the blank: He ___ breakfast at 7 AM.
What is she doing right now?
Fill in the blank: They ___ (study) English at the moment.
I ___ (work) at this company for 5 years. (Simple or Continuous?)
Yesterday, I ___ (go) to the supermarket.
Fill in the blank: She ___ (have) lunch at noon yesterday.
Which is the correct past tense of "see"?
What is an appropriate email greeting for a formal business email?
Fill in the blank: I am writing to ___ about our meeting.
Which phrases are appropriate to start a meeting? (Choose all)
Fill in the blank: Let me ___ by saying thank you all for coming.
